statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyManagementSystem;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM EnergyManagementSystem WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyManagementSystem WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT device_id, threshold FROM EnergyManagementSystem WHERE threshold < 50 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy FROM EnergyManagementSystem;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyManagementSystem WHERE threshold > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM EnergyManagementSystem WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND energy_usage < 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage FROM EnergyManagementSystem WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY device_id ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT threshold, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy FROM EnergyManagementSystem GROUP BY threshold HAVING total_energy > 500
SELECT device_id, timestamp, energy_usage AS usage, threshold FROM EnergyManagementSystem WHERE device_id = 101 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_thresholds;
SELECT device_id, energy_threshold FROM energy_thresholds WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_thresholds INNER JOIN energy_consumption ON energy_thresholds.device_id = energy_consumption.device_id;
SELECT device_id, energy_threshold FROM energy_thresholds WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id = 2 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_thresholds ORDER BY energy_threshold DESC;
SELECT MAX(energy_threshold) AS max_threshold FROM energy_thresholds;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_usage, TIMESTAMP FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY TIMESTAMP HAVING avg_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, alert_message FROM Thresholds WHERE energy_threshold < 50;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE device_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, energy_usage FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage < 50;
SELECT device_id, alert_message FROM Alerts JOIN Thresholds ON Alerts.device_id = Thresholds.threshold_id ORDER BY Alerts.timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, alert_message FROM Alerts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_thresholds;
SELECT device_id, threshold_value FROM energy_thresholds ORDER BY threshold_value DESC;
SELECT device_id, threshold_type FROM energy_thresholds WHERE threshold_type = 'high';
SELECT device_id, consumption_value, timestamp FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM device_info ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_thresholds;
SELECT device_id, threshold_value FROM energy_thresholds WHERE threshold_type = 'high';
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_info ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(consumption_value) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM alert_log WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM device_info WHERE location = 'office');
SELECT * FROM threshold_settings;
SELECT id, sensor_id, threshold_value FROM threshold_settings WHERE threshold_value < 50;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, energy_consumption FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_id, alert_message FROM alert_history WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_settings WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_settings WHERE alert_threshold > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE energy_consumption < 100;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_metadata WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, alert_message FROM alert_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, threshold_value FROM threshold_settings WHERE sensor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
